data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Ma‘rib, Yemen from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Ma‘rib, Yemen
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, look after and teach the way that is best for the 60 believers living in Ma‘rib, Yemen.
data.verse: I will instruct you and teach you in the way you should go. I will counsel you with my loving eye on you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide the 60 believers in the state of Ma'rib into all truth as they interpret Scriptures.
data.verse: For the word of God is alive and active. Sharper than any double-edged sword, it penetrates even to dividing soul and spirit, joints and marrow;

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 60 believers in the state of Ma'rib to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Deaf people.
Lord, for the leaders in the state of Ma'rib, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give the apostles in Ma‘rib, Yemen a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Ma‘rib, Yemen to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.
